objects.text:
Premium Leather Upper
Classic Two-Tone Design
Retro Basketball Heritage
All-Day Comfort

product_details.name: Nike Dunk Low 'Team Green' - Classic Two-Tone Sneakers
product_details.description:
• Iconic green and white colorway combining vintage style with modern comfort
• Premium leather upper with perforated toe box for enhanced breathability
• Classic Nike Dunk silhouette inspired by retro basketball heritage
• Durable rubber outsole with pivot points for excellent traction
• Padded collar and tongue for superior comfort and support
• Signature Nike branding on tongue and heel
• Versatile design suitable for both casual wear and streetwear
• High-quality stitching and construction for long-lasting durability
• Clean two-tone color blocking perfect for any outfit combination
• Foam midsole providing lightweight cushioning for all-day comfort

banner_details:
The banner features a modern, polished layout with a clean and structured aesthetic, designed to promote a sneaker product. The centerpiece is a high-quality close-up product image ("product_image") of green and white sneakers, set against a soft off-white background with layered geometric SVG elements ("background") that add depth. At the top, there's a bold, all-uppercase headline ("heading") in a dark green serif font to grab attention, followed by a sleek, tech-inspired subheading ("subheading") indicating the product line. Below that, a horizontal line ("decorative") separates the header from the feature list ("description") which outlines key product attributes in concise bulleted lines. A limited-time offer tag ("tagline") sits above the prominently displayed price in bold text ("price"). A rectangular green call-to-action ("cta_background") contains a white text button ("cta") urging purchase. The layout is balanced and informative, optimal for ad conversion.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Green: `#1E553E`
- Forest Green: `#2D7B5A`
- Light Cream: `#FCFCF8`
- Off-White: `#F5F5F0`
- Charcoal: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish pair of Nike sneakers with a clean and classic green-and-white color scheme. The dominant forest green (#1C5D3A) adorns the overlays, laces, swoosh, and brand text, creating strong visual contrast. Pure white (#FFFFFF) is used for the base, midsole, and tongue, allowing the green elements to stand out sharply. A touch of slightly off-white on the socks (#F2F2F2) softens the transition between shoe and skin. The colors are sharply defined with minimal blending, emphasizing contrast for a bold look. This makes a complementary advertisement palette of forest green, white, and light grey ideal for brand visibility.
